short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your new tab with live wallpapers of Nature!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nature Start Page - Live Wallpapers is more than just a new tab page - it's a gateway to a more peaceful, efficient, and personalized browsing experience. "By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Nature Start Page" extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use"

Features:

★ Live Nature Wallpapers: Experience the tranquility of nature every time you open a new tab. Our extension brings the beauty of the outdoors to your screen with stunning, live nature scenes that change dynamically, offering a peaceful and ever-refreshing backdrop to your browsing experience.

★ Image Nature Wallpapers with Customization: Choose from a vast collection of static nature images for your new tab background. Tailor your experience by adding and changing wallpapers according to your mood or preference, ensuring a personalized touch of nature's serenity.

★ Shortcut Integration: Effortlessly add new shortcuts to your most visited websites right on the new tab. This feature allows for quick and easy access to your favorite online destinations, blending functionality with the calm of your chosen nature scene.

★ Custom Wallpaper Uploads: Go beyond our library by uploading your own wallpapers. This feature allows you to personalize your new tab even further with images that have a special meaning or evoke a sense of peace and relaxation for you.

★ Date and time: Your watch and date directly to your home page with smooth live update of hours, minutes and seconds .

*Our extension is not part of Google but is rather an independent product.
Please read our Privacy Policy - https://www.mlion.io/privacy-policy
Contact us: https://www.mlion.io/contact
